TEXT.TITLE: A/W BRANDS <SODA.O> COMPLETES ACQUISITION
TEXT.BODY: A and W Brands Inc said it completed the acquisition of Vernors Inc from United Brands Co <UB> in a cash and stock transaction worth valued at about 10 mln dlrs Reuter
